languages.text: "Определенно. Заявляю это как сенешаль, офицер и дворянин. Прикончить эт{mf|ого|у} {mf|ублюдка|суку}".
"Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."
languages.original_text: "Определенно. Заявляю это как сенешаль, офицер и дворянин. Прикончить эт{mf|ого|у} {mf|ублюдка|суку}".

traits.locale_text: "Most definitely. I am saying this as a Seneschal, an officer and a noble man. Do shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Most definitely. I am saying this as a Seneschal, an officer and a noble man. Do shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: "Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."

languages.text: « Absolument. Je vous le dis en ma qualité de sénéchal, d'officier et de noble : abattez cette ordure. »
languages.original_text: "Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument. Je vous le dis en ma qualité de sénéchal, d'officier et de noble : abattez cette ordure. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Desde luego. Como Senescal, como oficial y como noble, le ordeno que le pegue un tiro a es{mf|e hijo de puta|a hija de puta}».
languages.original_text: "Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego. Como Senescal, como oficial y como noble, le ordeno que le pegue un tiro a es{mf|e hijo de puta|a hija de puta}».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我也一样。我以总领、军官与正直之人的身份赞同你的看法，我们一定要宰了那个{mf|臭杂种|臭婊子}。”
languages.original_text: "Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: “我也一样。我以总领、军官与正直之人的身份赞同你的看法，我们一定要宰了那个{mf|臭杂种|臭婊子}。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「間違いないでしょう。家令長として、士官として、そして貴族として告げます。あの愚か者を撃て」
languages.original_text: "Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: 「間違いないでしょう。家令長として、士官として、そして貴族として告げます。あの愚か者を撃て」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Unbedingt. Ich sage das als Truchsess, als Offizier und als Edelmann. Erschießt {mf|das Arschloch|die Hure}."
languages.original_text: "Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: "Unbedingt. Ich sage das als Truchsess, als Offizier und als Edelmann. Erschießt {mf|das Arschloch|die Hure}."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kesinlikle. Bir Seneşal, subay ve soylu olarak söylüyorum ki bu pisliği vurmalısınız."
languages.original_text: "Most definitely. I say this as a Seneschal, an officer, and a nobleman: shoot the {mf|bastard|bitch}."
